IDeviceEvent - Class in net.realmproject.dcm.event
A DeviceEvent consists of an id representing the device of publication, a type representing the intent of the message, and an optional Serializable payload.
IDeviceEvent(DeviceMessageType, String) - Constructor for class net.realmproject.dcm.event.IDeviceEvent
Creates a new DeviceEvent with no payload and a current timestamp
IDeviceEvent(DeviceMessageType, String, Serializable) - Constructor for class net.realmproject.dcm.event.IDeviceEvent
Creates a new DeviceEvent with the given payload and a current timestamp
IDeviceEvent(DeviceMessageType, String, Serializable, Date) - Constructor for class net.realmproject.dcm.event.IDeviceEvent
Creates a new DeviceEvent with the given payload and timestamp

IDeviceEventBusForwarder - Class in net.realmproject.dcm.event.bus
Forwards events from one DeviceEventBus to another, applying the optional filter to control which messages are allowed through.
